name: VINTAGE METAL TRUNK
description: An fabulous vintage industrial chic metal trunk, perfect or storing blankets, toys or magazines. There is a catch and hook ready to take a padlock if you wanted to keep it locked. Two handles either side for carrying. Painted in a matt black. DIMENSIONS: L113cm // D52cm // H155m Viewings Welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: PARIS GREY DRESSING TABLE
description: Pretty vintage dressing table with a tilting mirror. Two small drawers and one large drawer with pretty ornate original handles. The Dressing table sits on lovely turned legs. The mirror does have some silvering and wear consummate with it's age, this just adds to it's character. Painted in Paris Grey to base and graphite to the top. lightly distressed and finished in wax. DIMENSIONS: L113cm // D52cm // H155m Viewings Welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: ANTIQUE DRESSING TABLE
description: Beautifully elegant antique dressing table with three drawers. The upright spindles holding the mirror are turned with a pretty pattern, the lovely shaped mirror which swivels is bevelled. The drawers have their original handles. The whole piece sits on it's original brass castors. Would make a stunning centre piece to any baedroom. DIMENSIONS: 144cm H x 106cm W x 46cm D Viewings welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: RECLAIMED FLOORBOARD MIRROR
description: Large Wooden framed mirror made with reclaimed floor boards. DIMENSIONS: 121cm H x 84cm W x 3cm D Viewings welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: VICTORIAN DRESSER
description: A stunning example of a Victorian Glazed topped dresser. The doors the top half has it's original hand blown glass with subtle ripples. Each door is framed with a carved ribbon and flower detail. Tongue and groove to the inside and two shelves painted in Old White. The bottom half has two drawers with wooden knobs, and two doors again framed with ribbon and flower detailing. Inside the cupboard has a shelf offering lots of storage space. This would be a stunning addition to a kitchen or dining room. Painted in Autentico Castle Grey to the outside, lightly distressed and finished with a matt sealer. DIMENSIONS: 205cm H x 114cm W x 48cm D Viewings welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: HAIRPIN LEG CONSOLE TABLE
description: An uber cool wooden topped console table made with hand crafted steel hairpin legs based on a mid century design. Great as a work station, console table or a compact kitchen table. The legs are finished in a matt black paint, and the top painted with a whitewash and finished in a flat matt varnish. OPTIONS: Whitewashed // Unfinished Wood // Supply Legs Only (so that you can choose your own surface) DIMENSIONS: 120cm L x 49cm W x 78cm H Made in the UK Supplied flat packed with fixings included Viewings Welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: INDUSTRIAL STYLE STOOLS
description: Add a touch of industrial chic to your house with these on trend stools. The base is made of tubular steel, painted black with the seat made of wood which has been waxed. There are currently four available. DIMENSIONS: 41cm L x 43cm W x 54cm H

name: MID CENTURY HANDMADE COFFEE TABLE
description: Uber cool mid century coffee table. Sleek, stylish and on trend, this coffee table was hand made in the 1950's, the top has been waxed showing off it's lovely grain and the legs painted in grey as a contrast. DIMENSIONS: 81cm L x 39cm W x 48 cm H

name: PARIS GREY VINTAGE WASH STAND
description: Pretty Vintage Washstand with lots of lovely details. It has two doors, with caved frames and brass handles. The corner of the legs has some pretty fretwork and stands on original castors. This would look great anywhere in the house, a versatile piece with lots of storage. Painted in Paris Grey, Lightly Distressed and finished in wax. DIMENSIONS: 105cm L x 48cm D x 80cm H Viewings welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

This would make a stunning bed spread, or thrown over the sofa for those autumn evenings in front of the log fire.

100% Pure Wool

DIMENSIONS: 166cm W x cm 204cm L

name: WALL SHELVES

This would look amazing in a kitchen, decorated with some of your favorite everyday items. It also as two grooves on every shelf making it ideal for storing plates. Freshly Painted in Annie Sloan’s Paris Grey, lightly distressed and finished in wax. Good Solid Condition. DIMENSIONS: H129.cm // W100.cm // D20.cm

name: ANTIQUE SIDE CHAIR

name: 1920's BEDROOM CUPBOARD
description: A very practical and handsome cupboard. It has lots of lovely features. Two drawers and two doors with original handles, carved upright to the back and sits on pretty bun feet. Freshly Painted in Paris Grey paint, lightly distressed and finished in wax. DIMENSIONS: L87.cm // D46.cm // H92.cm Viewings Welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.

name: VICTORIAN FIRESIDE CHAIR
description: SUMMER SALE down from £1200 - £800 Amazing Antique Upholstered armchair. This chair dates back to the Victorian Era, when they really knew how to make elegant and comfortable chairs, I fell asleep the first time I sat in this to try it out, it is the most comfortable chair I have ever sat in, seriously! It has the most perfect recline on it, with brand new upholstery in a beautifully soft hounds-tooth wool, sourced from Europe. The pretty carved legs have their original castors, perfectly proportioned, making this a very elegant chair, a huge treat to adorn any living room. I would highly recommend visiting us and trying the chair out, but be warned you will fall in love. COLOUR: Soft Grey/Brown & Charcoal DIMENSIONS: H95.cm // W78.cm // D91.cm MORE IMAGES ON THE BLOG Viewings welcome, please contact me to arrange a convenient time.
